term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - substance content, n/m
term.title: substance content

item.text: Amount-of-substance of a component divided by the mass of the system.

notes.item: The term component is recommended for clinical chemistry, ISO uses 'substance'.
The term system is recommended for clinical chemistry, ISO uses mixture.
Use of the term level as a synonym for content is deprecated.
In describing a quantity, content must be clearly differentiated from concentration.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 994 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)
